text: The Game of Liberty is a 1916 British silent comedy crime film directed by George Loane Tucker and starring Gerald Ames, Douglas Munro and Laura Cowie. It is also known by the alternative title of Under Suspicion. It was based on the 1915 novel of the same title by E. Phillips Oppenheim.Goble p.352 ==Cast== * Gerald Ames as Hon. Paul Walmsley * Douglas Munro as Joseph H. Parker * Laura Cowie as Eva Parker * Bert Wynne as Inspector Cullen * Sydney Fairbrother as Mrs. Bundercombe * Hugh Croise as Bert Johnson ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. ==External links== * Category:1916 films Category:1910s crime comedy films Category:British films Category:British silent feature films Category:British crime comedy films Category:English- language films Category:Films directed by George Loane Tucker Category:Films set in England Category:Films based on British novels Category:British black- and-white films Category:1916 comedy films
title: The Game of Liberty (film)
